sj_96f72d8eea6daf8a.title: Senior JS/VUE/HASURA Developer
sj_96f72d8eea6daf8a.desc:
The Job
Our most immediate need is for a senior full-stack engineer with ES6 Javascript/Typescript, Vue.js v3, Hasura/GraphQL/Postgres. We are servicing a contract with a Fortune 100 energy company among others.
As an agency/consultancy we are standardizing our software stack around JAM and are looking for candidates who want to build digital products in this modern stack. Several green-field projects on the horizon, along with ample opportunities for both technical and people leadership.
The Company
Incyte Studios, LLC is a software development agency/consultancy. We help our customers realize their technical goals from planning to completion. In the past this has involved everything from development of web applications to designing inventory tracking for smart refrigerators.
Incyte Studios was founded by a software developer, which means leadership focuses on generating new business instead of micromanaging developers. We'll keep you loaded to the brim with interesting work, give you the freedom and room to excel how you see fit, and offer mentorship to those seeking to learn from a team of veterans.
The Soft Skills
The right candidates for this job are more interested in shipping good product than debating dogma about languages. If you're more into talking about the right amount of test coverage than shipping something, this probably isn't the right fit.
Experience

JavaScript: 10 years
TypeScript: 2 years
Vue: 3 years
HTML/CSS: 10+ years
Hasura/GraphQL: 1 year
Postgres: 2 years

Nice to Have

Docker
Python
AWS

Job Type: Full-time
Pay: $50.00 - $70.00 per hour
Benefits:

401(k)
401(k) matching
Dental insurance
Health insurance
Vision insurance

Schedule:

8 hour shift

Supplemental pay types:

Bonus pay

Work Location: Remote
